content: round 14 k3 magic_ring k7 ml k14 24 sts rds 15-19 k24 round 20 k16 magic_ring k7 ml k1 26 sts round 21 k3 k2tog k3 ssk k14 24 sts round 22 k24 round 23 k3 k2tog k3 ssk k14 22 sts round 24 k22 round 25 k2 k2tog k3 ssk k2 switch to white yarn but don t break black yarn and begin first short row k9 w&t p7 w&t k6 w&t p5 w&t k7 w&t p9 w&t k8 w&t p7 w&t k6 w&t p8 w&t switch back to black don t break white k11 20 sts round 26 k20 recommend stuffing the tail and body up to this point round 27 k11 ssk k3 k2tog w&t p5 w&t k7 18 sts round 28 k18 round 29 k1 ssk k3 k2tog k1 switch to white don t break black k1 ssk k3 k2tog k1 14 sts round 30 k13 w&t p5 w&t k6 round 31 k14 round 32 k7 switch back to black cut white leaving long tail k7 stuff chest and neck round 33 k2 magic_ring k3 ml k1 w&t p7 w&t k2 magic_ring k3 ml k1 w&t p7 w&t k6 w&t p5 w&t k4 w&t p3 w&t k14 18 sts round 34 k18 round 35 ssk k7 k2tog k7 16 sts round 36 k16 stuff head round 37 k1 k2tog k3 ssk k1 ssk k3 k2tog 12 sts rds 38 & 39 k12 round 40 optional switch to grey k1 ssk k1 k2tog k1 ssk k1 k2tog 8 sts rds 41 & 42 k8 this is probably your last chance to get stuffing in round 43 k1 cdd k4 6 sts round 44 k6 break yarn leaving about 8 inches thread through the first 3 sts then work a cdd on the last 3 sts finally thread the tail through the final loop attach beads for eyes using black yarn tail use the long tail of white yarn for the back spots i simply wove the yarn over and under the knit stitches you can add as much detail as you like such as black vertical stitching for the neck band using grey for the beak is optional since i think it looks fine with minimal detail too this pattern is dedicated to my fellow northern/great lakes state of minnesota and everyone doing the hard work of active resistance and protecting their communities during the current political turmoil this pattern is free of charge and should remain that way please do not sell this pattern feel free to gift or sell completed knitted items ideally with some portion of the proceeds going to good causes such as immigration law centers and funds -briar of the woods
